message.body: I got the hammer drill and you can have it next week. I just talk to my dad about it, since I haven't seen in a while, and he said its because he has it. Je will give it back to me sometimes next week. He doesn't need it anymore.

Thanks! But there's no real rush. We have a ton of other projects to finish before we can even consider finishing the basement. Maybe you can come over sometime and give us some ideas on finishing basement.
Sounds good. Maybe this week, since you are around. I will be home with boys wed and Th so maybe one of those days of are around. Also, I have to check your backsplash too.
Sounds good, we'll work it out.
